name: Insta-Fame Mac & Cheese Mug
instructions: Combine macaroni and water in a large, microwave-safe mug.
Microwave on high for 2-3 minutes, or until pasta is cooked.
Stir in milk, cheese, salt, and pepper.
Microwave for another 30-60 seconds, until cheese is melted and creamy.
author: system

name: Speedy Microwave Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper in a microwave-safe mug or bowl.
Microwave for 45 seconds. Stir.
Microwave for another 30-45 seconds, until eggs are set.
Stir in cheese.
author: system

name: Better-Than-Takeout Ramen Upgrade
instructions: Place ramen, frozen veggies, and water (according to package) in a large bowl.
Microwave for 3 minutes.
Gently crack the egg into the hot broth. Let it sit for 1-2 minutes to poach.
Stir in the ramen seasoning packet and a splash of soy sauce or sriracha.
author: system

name: Quick Queso Dip
instructions: Combine cheese and salsa in a microwave-safe bowl.
Microwave for 1-2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, until melted.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips.
author: system

name: Loaded Baked Potato
instructions: Wash the potato and pierce it several times with a fork.
Microwave on high for 5-7 minutes, or until tender.
Slice open, fluff with a fork, and top with butter, sour cream, cheese, and bacon bits.
author: system

name: Dorm Room Fried Rice
instructions: Cook instant rice with water in the microwave according to package directions.
Stir in frozen peas and carrots and microwave for 1 more minute.
Add the pre-scrambled egg and soy sauce, and stir to combine.
author: system

name: Speedy Black Bean Soup
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a microwave-safe bowl.
Microwave for 2-3 minutes, until hot.
Top with shredded cheese or a dollop of sour cream if desired.
author: system

name: Cheesy Tuna Melt
instructions: Mix tuna and mayonnaise in a small bowl.
Spread tuna mixture on one slice of bread. Top with cheese and the other slice.
Microwave for 45-60 seconds, or toast beforehand for crispier texture.
author: system

name: No-Boil Pasta
instructions: Combine pasta and water in a large microwave-safe bowl.
Microwave for 4-6 minutes, stirring halfway.
Drain excess water, stir in sauce, and microwave 1 more minute.
Top with parmesan.
author: system

name: Apple Cinnamon Baked Apples
instructions: Core the apple and place in a microwave-safe bowl.
Fill the center with sugar, cinnamon, and butter.
Microwave for 3-5 minutes until tender.
author: system

name: Classic Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice the tomato and mozzarella.
Layer tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
Drizzle with glaze and oil. Season with salt and pepper.
author: system

name: Study-Sesh Trail Mix
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a container.
Shake to mix well.
author: system

name: Savory Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread.
Mash avocado on toast. Sprinkle with seasoning and flakes.
author: system

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass or jar.
Repeat until full.
author: system

name: No-Fuss Black Bean & Corn Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Serve with chips or as a side.
author: system

name: Peanut Butter Banana Sushi
instructions: Spread peanut butter over tortilla.
Place banana on one edge and roll tightly.
Slice into 1-inch pieces.
author: system

name: Overnight Oats
instructions: Combine oats, milk, chia seeds, and sweetener in a jar.
Stir well, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
Top with fruit and nuts before serving.
author: system

name: Hummus & Veggie Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus on tortilla.
Layer spinach, carrots, and cucumber.
Roll up and slice.
author: system

name: Italian Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix tuna with onion, capers, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Serve with crackers or on bread.
author: system

name: Simple Chili
instructions: Brown meat and drain.
Add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder.
Simmer 10–15 minutes.
author: system

name: Easy Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta, drain, reserve some water.
Stir in pesto, tomatoes, and reserved water.
Top with parmesan.
author: system

name: Smarter Sausage & Peppers
instructions: Cook peppers and onions in oil until soft.
Add sausage slices and cook until heated.
author: system

name: Speedy Goulash
instructions: Brown beef and drain.
Add macaroni, sauce, water, and seasoning.
Simmer 15–20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
author: system

name: Air Fryer Roasted Veggies
instructions: Toss veggies with oil and seasoning.
Air fry at 400°F for 10–15 minutes.
author: system

name: Hot Plate Grilled Cheese
instructions: Butter bread slices and place cheese in between.
Grill on hot plate until golden and melted.
author: system

name: One-Pan Lemon Herb Chicken & Veggies
instructions: Cook chicken in oil with herbs and seasonings.
Add broccoli and lemon juice. Cover and cook until tender.
author: system

name: Egg Roll in a Bowl
instructions: Brown meat, drain fat.
Add coleslaw mix, soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.
Stir and cook until well combined.
author: system

name: Perfect Pan-Fried Eggs
instructions: Heat butter or oil in pan.
Crack eggs and cook to preferred doneness.
Season with salt and pepper.
author: system

name: Basic Boiled Eggs
instructions: Place eggs in pot and cover with water.
Boil, then cover and rest off heat 10–12 minutes.
Cool with cold water.
author: system

name: Simple Steamed Rice
instructions: Rinse rice and combine with water and salt in pot.
Boil, then simmer 15–20 mins covered.
Let stand and fluff.
author: system

name: Savory Oatmeal
instructions: Cook oats. Top with fried egg.
Drizzle with soy sauce and season.
author: system

name: Air Fryer Chicken Nuggets
instructions: Bread chicken pieces using flour, egg, breadcrumbs.
Air fry at 375°F for 8–10 minutes, flipping halfway.
author: system

name: Basic Tomato Sauce
instructions: Sauté garlic in oil, add tomatoes and herbs.
Simmer at least 15 minutes.
author: system

name: Simple Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados. Mix in other ingredients.
Serve immediately.
author: system

name: Two-Ingredient Dough
instructions: Mix flour and yogurt into a dough.
Knead and shape. Bake at 375°F for 12–15 minutes.
author: system
